trans-unit.source: Implements the basic functionality required by text controls.
trans-unit.target: 实现由文本控件所需的基本功能。

trans-unit.source: This class implements the core features of text manipulation controls, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现中的文本操作控件，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>的核心功能

trans-unit.source: These include text selection, **Clipboard** functionality, multiline text control support, and many events.
trans-unit.target: 其中包括文本选择**剪贴板**功能、 多行文本框控件支持和很多事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pressing the TAB key in a multiline text box control types a TAB character in the control instead of moving the focus to the next control in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否按 TAB 键在多行文本框框控件类型的控件而不是将焦点移动到下一个控件的 tab 键顺序按一个 TAB 字符。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> property must also be `true` to get a TAB character in the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>属性还必须是`true`控件中获取一个 TAB 字符。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the AcceptsTab property is set to `true`, the user must press CTRL+TAB to move the focus to the next control in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 如果 AcceptsTab 属性设置为`true`，用户必须按 CTRL + TAB 将焦点移动到下一个控件的 tab 键顺序。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if users can enter tabs in a multiline text box using the TAB key; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if pressing the TAB key moves the focus.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果用户可以使用 TAB 键为多行文本框中输入选项卡<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果按 TAB 键将焦点移。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab*> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab*>属性已更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab*>

trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Appends text to the current text of a text box.
trans-unit.target: 将文本追加到当前的文本框的文本。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to add text to the existing text in the control instead of using the concatenation operator (+) to concatenate text to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法将文本添加到而不是使用串联运算符 （+） 将文本串联起来控件中的现有文本到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text to append to the current contents of the text box.
trans-unit.target: 要追加到文本框中的当前内容的文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the height of the control automatically adjusts when the font assigned to the control is changed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值分配给控件的字体更改时是否自动调整控件的高度。

trans-unit.source: When you set the AutoSize property to `true` for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> changes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> expands or contracts the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> to accommodate the larger or smaller text.
trans-unit.target: 当将 AutoSize 属性设置为`true`为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>，当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>更改，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>会扩大或缩小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>以容纳更大或更小的文本。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> does not change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>不会更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the size of the control as the user enters text, you can use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control and use its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.ContentsResized> event to change its size.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要更改控件的大小，在用户输入文本时，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件，并使用其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.ContentsResized>事件来更改其大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.ContentsResized> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the height of the control automatically adjusts when the font is changed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果更改字体; 时自动调整控件的高度否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的背景色。

trans-unit.source: You can use the BackColor property to change the background color of the text control to blend into the color scheme of your forms.
trans-unit.target: BackColor 属性可用于更改要到窗体的配色方案混合的文本控件的背景色。

trans-unit.source: To change the color of the text within the control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ForeColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改控件中的文本的颜色，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ForeColor%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: When setting the BackColor property of your text control, ensure that the color you choose does not cause the text of the control to disappear.
trans-unit.target: 设置文本控件 BackColor 属性时，请确保您所选的颜色不会导致要消失的控件的文本。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the BackColor and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ForeColor%2A> properties are both set to `Color.Black`, the text within your textbox control will not be visible.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果将背景色和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ForeColor%2A>属性都设置为`Color.Black`，文本框控件中的文本将不可见。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property might be over ridden if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可能会通过替代如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，它表示控件的背景。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border type of the text box control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置文本框控件的边框类型。

trans-unit.source: You can use the BorderStyle property to create borderless and flat style controls, in addition to the default three-dimensional control.
trans-unit.target: BorderStyle 属性可用于创建无边框和平面风格的控件，除了默认的三维控件。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The derived class, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>, does not support the `BorderStyle.FixedSingle` style.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 派生的类， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>，不支持`BorderStyle.FixedSingle`样式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: This style will cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> to use the `BorderStyle.Fixed3D` style instead.
trans-unit.target: 此样式将导致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>使用`BorderStyle.Fixed3D`改为样式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> that represents the border type of the text box control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref>表示在文本框控件的边框类型。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Fixed3D" name="Fixed3D" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Fixed3D" name="Fixed3D" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user can undo the previous operation in a text box control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示用户可以撤消文本框控件中的上一操作。

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `true`, you can call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Undo%2A> method to undo the last operation in a text box.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法返回`true`，可以调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Undo%2A>方法来撤消文本框中的上一个操作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Undo%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Popup> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, or in code that manages the state of buttons on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> to enable or disable the ability to undo the previous operation in a text box control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Popup>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>，或在管理的按钮的状态的代码中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>启用或禁用撤消文本框控件中的上一操作的能力。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Popup>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can undo the previous operation performed in a text box control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果用户能否撤消上一个文本框控件，则在执行的操作否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Clears all text from the text box control.
trans-unit.target: 清除文本框控件中的所有文本。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to clear the contents of the control instead of assigning the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A> property an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法清除而不是分配控件的内容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>属性为空字符串。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Clears information about the most recent operation from the undo buffer of the text box.
trans-unit.target: 清除文本框的撤消缓冲区从最新操作的相关信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to prevent an undo operation from repeating, based on the state of your application.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此方法以防止重复，撤消操作根据你的应用程序的状态。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the text box is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 单击文本框中时发生。

trans-unit.target: 在文本框中复制当前选定内容**剪贴板**。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method, instead of using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class, to copy text in the text box and place it in the **Clipboard**.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法，而不是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>类中，以在文本框中复制文本并将它置于**剪贴板**。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.target: 创建控件句柄。

trans-unit.target: 创建控件句柄时，请获取需要的创建参数。

trans-unit.source: Moves the current selection in the text box to the **Clipboard**.
trans-unit.target: 在文本框中移动当前选择**剪贴板**。

trans-unit.source: This method will only cut text from the text box if text is selected in the control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法只会从文本框剪切的文本，如果控件中选定文本。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method, instead of using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class, to copy text in the text box and move it to the **Clipboard**.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法，而不是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>类中，以在文本框中复制文本，然后将其移动到**剪贴板**。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default cursor for the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的默认光标。

trans-unit.source: Override DefaultCursor to configure a default cursor for your control.
trans-unit.target: 重写缺省游标来配置您的控件的默认光标。

trans-unit.source: This is more efficient than setting the cursor in the control's constructor, and gives automatic support for certain cursor-related designer functions.
trans-unit.target: 这比将光标设置在控件的构造函数中更高效，并为自动支持提供某些游标相关的设计器函数。

trans-unit.source: An object of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"></xref> representing the current default cursor.
trans-unit.target: 类型的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"></xref>表示当前默认光标。

trans-unit.target: 获取控件的默认大小。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>的控件。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength*> property is zero so that no characters are selected in the control.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength*>属性为零，以便在控件中选择任何字符。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength*>

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否绘制的控件执行的缓冲区中显示的控件之前。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的前景色。

trans-unit.source: You can use the ForeColor property to change the color of the text within the control to match the text of other controls on your form.
trans-unit.target: 前景色属性可用于更改以匹配窗体上其他控件的文本控件中的文本的颜色。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to highlight a specific text box that contains an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用此属性以突出显示一个特定的文本框包含无效值。

trans-unit.source: To change the background color of the control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改控件的背景色，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BackColor%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: When setting the ForeColor property of your text control, ensure that the color you choose does not cause the text of the control to disappear.
trans-unit.target: 设置文本控件的前景色属性时，请确保您所选的颜色不会导致要消失的控件的文本。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the ForeColor and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BackColor%2A> properties are both set to `Color.Black`, the text within your textbox control will not be visible.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果前景色和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BackColor%2A>属性都设置为`Color.Black`，文本框控件中的文本将不可见。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property might be over ridden if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可能会通过替代如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the control's foreground color.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>表示控件的前景色。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the character that is closest to the specified location within the control.
trans-unit.target: 检索控件内的指定位置最接近的字符。

trans-unit.source: If the location specified in the `pt` parameter is outside the client area of the control, the first character of the string closest to the point specified in `pt` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果在指定位置`pt`控件中指定的点到距离最近的字符串的第一个字符的工作区以外的参数是`pt`返回。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine which characters are located near a specific point within the control.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此方法来确定哪些字符位于控件内的特定点附近。

trans-unit.source: You can then use this value to perform operations on the text at that location.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以使用此值在该位置的文本上执行操作。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the specified location in the `pt` parameter is located on the right side of the client area of the control, the last character of the string closest to the point specified in `pt` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果中的指定的位置`pt`参数位于控件中指定的点到距离最近的字符串的最后一个字符的工作区右侧`pt`返回。

trans-unit.source: The location from which to seek the nearest character.
trans-unit.target: 要从中查找最近的字符位置。

trans-unit.source: The character at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 位于指定位置处的字符。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the index of the character nearest to the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 检索距离指定位置最近的字符索引。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the character index that is closest to the position specified in the `pt` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回与指定的位置最接近的字符索引`pt`参数。

trans-unit.source: The character index is a zero-based index of text in the control, including spaces.
trans-unit.target: 字符索引是文本的在控件中，包括空格中的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine where in the text the user has the mouse over by passing the mouse coordinates to this method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于确定在文本中用户在其上将鼠标放将鼠标坐标传递给此方法。

trans-unit.source: This can be useful if you want to perform tasks when the user rests the mouse pointer over a word in the text of the control.
trans-unit.target: 这很有用，如果你想要在用户将鼠标指针停留在该控件的文本中的单词时执行任务。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If the specified location is not within the client rectangle of the control, or is beyond the last character in the control, the return value is the index of the last character.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 如果指定的位置不在该控件的客户端矩形内，或不在控件中的最后一个字符，返回值是最后一个字符的索引。

trans-unit.source: The location to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的位置。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based character index at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 位于指定位置的从零开始的字符索引。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the index of the first character of a given line.
trans-unit.target: 检索给定行的第一个字符的索引。

trans-unit.source: Line numbering in the text box starts at zero.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的行号在文本框中。

trans-unit.source: If the `lineNumber` parameter is greater than the last line in the text box, GetFirstCharIndexFromLine returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果`lineNumber`参数大于在文本框中的最后一行，GetFirstCharIndexFromLine 返回-1。

trans-unit.source: GetFirstCharIndexFromLine returns the first character index of a physical line.
trans-unit.target: GetFirstCharIndexFromLine 返回物理行的第一个字符索引。

trans-unit.source: The physical line is the displayed line, not the assigned line.
trans-unit.target: 物理行是显示的行中，不是分配行。

trans-unit.source: The number of displayed lines can be greater than the number of assigned lines due to word wrap.
trans-unit.target: 显示的行数可以大于由于自动换行分配行数。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you assign two long lines to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control and set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> to `true`, the two long assigned lines result in four physical (or displayed lines).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果分配到两个长行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件并设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>到`true`，两个已分配的长行产生四个物理 （或显示行）。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: The line for which to get the index of its first character.
trans-unit.target: 要为其获取其第一个字符的索引行。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first character in the specified line.
trans-unit.target: 指定的行中的第一个字符的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The value of the lineNumber parameter is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 值 lineNumber 参数小于零。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the index of the first character of the current line.
trans-unit.target: 检索当前行的第一个字符的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based character index in the current line.
trans-unit.target: 中的当前行的从零开始的字符索引。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the line number from the specified character position within the text of the control.
trans-unit.target: 从控件文本内的指定的字符位置检索行号。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to determine the line number based on the character index specified in the `index` parameter of the method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于确定基于中指定的字符索引的行号`index`的方法参数。

trans-unit.source: The first line of text in the control returns the value zero.
trans-unit.target: 控件中的文本的第一行返回值零。

trans-unit.source: The GetLineFromCharIndex method returns the physical line number where the indexed character is located within the control.
trans-unit.target: GetLineFromCharIndex 方法返回的索引的字符所在的位置在控件内的物理行号。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a portion of the first logical line of text in the control wraps to the next line, the GetLineFromCharIndex method returns 1 if the character at the specified character index has wrapped to the second physical line.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果文本控件中第一个逻辑行的一部分换行到下一行，GetLineFromCharIndex 方法返回 1，如果指定的字符索引处的字符已经换行到第二个物理行。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> is set to `false`, no portion of the line wraps to the next, and the method returns 0 for the specified character index.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>设置为`false`、 行的任何部分被换到下一行，并且该方法返回对指定的字符索引为 0。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine which line a specific character index is located within.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于确定哪一行是位于特定的字符索引。

trans-unit.source: For example, after calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method to search for text, you can obtain the character index to where the search results are found.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法来搜索的文本，你可以获取到找到搜索结果的字符索引。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can call this method with the character index returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method to determine which line the word was found.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用此方法返回的字符索引与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>找不到方法，以确定其行单词。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the character index specified in the `index` parameter is beyond the available number of lines contained within the control, the last line number is returned.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果中指定的字符索引`index`参数为超出可用的控件内包含的行数，则返回最后一个行号。

trans-unit.source: The character index position to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的字符索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based line number in which the character index is located.
trans-unit.target: 在其中的字符索引所在的从零开始的行号。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the location within the control at the specified character index.
trans-unit.target: 检索控件内指定的字符索引处的位置。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to determine where in the control a specific character index is located.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可确定在控件中特定的字符索引所在的位置。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method for such tasks as displaying shortcut menu items or help information for a word in the control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于任务，如在控件中显示快捷菜单项或帮助信息的单词。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you wanted to display a menu of options to the user when the user right clicks on a word in the control, you can use this method to determine the position of the word to properly display a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你想要向用户显示的菜单选项，当用户右键单击控件中的单词上，你可以使用此方法来确定单词以正确显示的位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: The index of the character for which to retrieve the location.
trans-unit.target: 要检索其位置的字符索引。

trans-unit.source: The location of the specified character within the client rectangle of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的客户端矩形内的指定字符位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the selected text in the text box control remains highlighted when the control loses focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件没有焦点时，在文本框控件中选定的文本是否保持突出显示。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to keep text highlighted in a text box control while another form or a dialog box has focus, such as a spelling checker dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于保留而另一个窗体或对话框中具有焦点，如拼写检查器对话框中，在文本框控件中突出显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the selected text does not appear highlighted when the text box control loses focus; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, if the selected text remains highlighted when the text box control loses focus.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>在文本框控件失去焦点; 时，如果未显示所选的文本将突出显示<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，如果在文本框控件没有焦点时，所选的文本保持突出显示。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.HideSelection*> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.HideSelection*>属性已更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.HideSelection*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Input Method Editor (IME) mode of a control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的输入法编辑器 (IME) 模式。

trans-unit.source: The IME mode of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的 IME 模式。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is an input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的键是输入的键还是需要预处理的特殊键。

trans-unit.source: The IsInputKey method returns `true` when the `keyData` parameter includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> value and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: IsInputKey 方法返回`true`时`keyData`参数包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>属性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>

trans-unit.source: IsInputKey returns `false` if `keyData` contains both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>.
trans-unit.target: IsInputKey 返回`false`如果`keyData`包含这两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>

trans-unit.source: One of the Keys value.
trans-unit.target: 密钥值之一。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is an input key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的键是输入的键，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the lines of text in a text box control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置文本框控件中的文本行。

trans-unit.source: Each element in the array becomes a line of text in the text box control.
trans-unit.target: 数组中的每个元素将成为在文本框控件中文本的行。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> property of the text box control is set to `true` and a newline character appears in the text, the text following the newline character is added to a new element in the array and displayed on a separate line.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>文本框控件的属性设置为`true`和换行字符的文本中出现，换行字符后面的文本是添加到数组中的新元素，并显示在单独一行上。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > By default, the collection of lines is a read-only copy of the lines in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 默认情况下，行的集合是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>中的行的只读副本

trans-unit.source: To get a writable collection of lines, use code similar to the following: `textBox1.Lines = new string[] { "abcd" };`
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的行可写的集合，请使用类似于以下代码︰`textBox1.Lines = new string[] { "abcd" };`

trans-unit.source: An array of strings that contains the text in a text box control.
trans-unit.target: 包含文本框控件中的文本的字符串数组。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters the user can type or paste into the text box control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置最大的用户可以键入或粘贴到文本框控件的字符数。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to restrict the length of text entered in the control for values such as postal codes and telephone numbers, or to restrict the length of text entered when the data is to be entered in a database.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此属性，以限制为如邮政编码和电话号码的值输入控件中的文本的长度或将输入数据时要输入在数据库中的文本的长度限制。

trans-unit.source: You can limit the text entered into the control to the maximum length of the corresponding field in the database.
trans-unit.target: 你可以限制到数据库中的对应字段的最大长度文本框控件中输入的文本。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In code, you can set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A> property to a value that has a length greater than the value specified by the MaxLength property.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 在代码中，你可以设置的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>属性的长度大于指定的 MaxLength 属性的值的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property only affects text entered into the control at run time.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅影响在运行时文本框控件中输入的文本。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters that can be entered into the control.
trans-unit.target: 可以文本框控件中输入的字符数。

trans-unit.source: The default is 32767.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 32767。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 分配给属性的值小于 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates that the text box control has been modified by the user since the control was created or its contents were last set.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指示到文本框控件中被修改用户由于已创建该控件创建或上次设置其内容。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine if the user has modified the contents of the text box control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于确定用户是否已修改文本框控件的内容。

trans-unit.source: You can also set this property in code to indicate that changes were made to the text box control by the application.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以在代码中以指示进行了更改到文本框控件由应用程序设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used by validation and data-saving methods to determine if changes were made in a text box control so the changed contents can be validated or saved.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以验证和数据保存方法，用于确定如果以便可以验证所更改的内容，或将其保存在一个文本框控件中进行了更改。

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A> property programmatically, the Modified property reverts to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>属性以编程方式，已修改属性将恢复为`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: This does not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ModifiedChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 这不会引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ModifiedChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ModifiedChanged>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control's contents have been modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件的内容已修改;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Modified*> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Modified*>属性已更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Modified*>

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A> property programmatically, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Modified%2A> property reverts to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>属性以编程方式，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Modified%2A>属性将恢复为`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Modified%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: This does not raise the ModifiedChanged event.
trans-unit.target: 这不会引发 ModifiedChanged 事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is clicked by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 用鼠标单击控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control does not raise a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Click> event for right clicks.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件不会引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Click>右键单击事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: The MouseClick event provides the functional equivalent.
trans-unit.target: MouseClick 事件提供在功能上等效。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a multiline text box control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示这是否为多行文本框控件。

trans-unit.source: A multiline text box allows you to display more than one line of text in the control.
trans-unit.target: 多行文本框中，可在控件中显示的文本的多个行。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> property is set to `true`, text entered into the multiline text box is wrapped to the next line in the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>属性设置为`true`，多行文本框中输入的文本换行到控件中的下一行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> property is set to `false`, text entered into the multiline text box control will be displayed on the same line until a newline character is entered.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>属性设置为`false`，直到输入换行字符输入到多行文本框控件的文本将显示在同一行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following can be used as newline characters: - <xref:System.Environment.NewLine%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - ControlChars.CrLf - vbCrLf (Visual Basic only) You can add scroll bars to a text box using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A> property to display horizontal and/or vertical scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: 以下可用作换行字符:- <xref:System.Environment.NewLine%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-ControlChars.CrLf-vbCrLf (仅在 Visual Basic 中) 可以将滚动条添加到文本中使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A>属性显示水平和/或垂直滚动条。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A> </xref:System.Environment.NewLine%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This allows the user to scroll through the text that extends beyond the dimensions of the control.
trans-unit.target: 这允许用户滚动控件的尺寸超出的文本。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because the default value of the Multiline property is `false`, the default size of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> will be in accordance with the font size even if you resize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 由于 Multiline 属性默认值为`false`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>将会根据字体大小，即使您调整<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>的默认大小

trans-unit.source: To get a consistent size for your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的一致大小你<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>，将其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > On Japanese operating systems, if the Multiline property is set to `true`, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> property will display the text of the password, thus compromising system security.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 日语操作系统在系统上，如果多行的属性设置为`true`，则设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>属性将显示的文本密码，从而危及系统安全。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, on Japanese operating systems, set the Multiline property to `false` if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在日语操作系统上将多行的属性设置为`false`如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is set to `false` by default for all derived classes, with the exception of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性设置为`false`默认情况下，所有派生类中，除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Multiline%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property affects whether or not the control will automatically resize, as follows: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.AutoSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Multiline%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set to `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> will not automatically resize.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Multiline%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性会影响是否控件将自动调整大小，，如下所示:-如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.AutoSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>设置为`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Multiline%2A?displayProperty=fullName>设置为`true`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>不会自动调整大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Multiline%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.AutoSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Multiline%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.AutoSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Multiline%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set to `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> will automatically resize.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.AutoSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>设置为`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Multiline%2A?displayProperty=fullName>设置为`false`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>将自动调整大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Multiline%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.AutoSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Replaces the current selection in the text box with the contents of the **Clipboard**.
trans-unit.target: 在文本框中当前所选内容的内容替换的**剪贴板**。

trans-unit.source: The Paste method will only paste text into the control if text is currently stored in the **Clipboard**.
trans-unit.target: 粘贴方法仅将文本粘贴到控件中当前存储文本如果**剪贴板**。

trans-unit.source: Gets the preferred height for a text box.
trans-unit.target: 获取文本框中的首选的高度。

trans-unit.source: The size returned by this property is based on the font height and border style of the text box.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的大小取决于文本框中的字体高度和边框样式。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine the appropriate size of the text box to ensure that text is properly displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于确定适当的大小的文本框中，以确保正确控件中显示文本。

trans-unit.source: The value returned by this property is in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的值是以像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: The value of PreferredHeight represents the minimum height the text box must have in order to display a single line of text without clipping the text on the top or bottom.
trans-unit.target: PreferredHeight 的值表示文本框中必须具备而无需剪辑上的上方或下方的文本显示单个文本行的最小高度。

trans-unit.source: This value is the same whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> property is set to `true` or `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此值是相同是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>属性设置为`true`或`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>

trans-unit.source: The preferred height of a text box.
trans-unit.target: 文本框中的首选的高度。

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: 处理命令键。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>，通过引用，它表示要处理的窗口消息传递。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the shortcut key to process.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>这些值表示要处理的快捷键。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the command key was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果命令键已由控件; 处理否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether text in the text box is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在文本框中的文本是否只读的。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the contents of the control cannot be changed by the user at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，不能在运行时用户更改控件的内容。

trans-unit.source: With this property set to `true`, you can still set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A> property in code.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为`true`，仍可以设置的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>在代码中的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this feature instead of disabling the control with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> property to allow the contents to be copied and ToolTips to be shown.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此功能，而不是禁用控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>属性，以允许要复制的内容和工具提示显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the text box is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果文本框中是只读的;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the contents of the control to the current caret position.
trans-unit.target: 滚动到当前插入符号位置控件的内容。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to scroll the contents of the control until the caret is within the visible region of the control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可滚动控件的内容，直到将脱字号插入控件的可见区域内。

trans-unit.source: If the caret is positioned below the visible region of the control, the ScrollToCaret method will scroll the contents of the control until the caret is visible at the bottom of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果脱字号位于控件的可见区域，ScrollToCaret 方法将滚动控件的内容，直到插入符号可见底部的控件。

trans-unit.source: If the caret is positioned above the visible region of the control, this method scrolls the contents of the control until the caret is visible at the top of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果脱字号位于控件的可见区域的上方，此方法将滚动控件的内容，直到插入符号可见控件顶部。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method in a multiline text box to ensure that the current text entry point is within the visible region of the control.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此方法在多行文本框中，以确保当前文本入口点是该控件的可见区域内。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method has no effect if the control does not have focus or if the caret is already positioned in the visible region of the control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此方法不起该控件没有焦点是否已在控件的可见区域中放置脱字号。

trans-unit.source: Selects a range of text in the text box.
trans-unit.target: 在文本框中选择文本的范围。

trans-unit.source: If you want to set the start position to the first character in the control's text, set the `start` parameter to 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要设置为控件的文本中的第一个字符的起始位置，设置`start`参数设为 0。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to select a substring of text, such as when searching through the text of the control and replacing information.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法以选择子字符串的文本，例如，当整个控件的文本搜索和替换信息。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can programmatically move the caret within the text box by setting the `start` parameter to the position within the text box where you want the caret to move to and set the `length` parameter to a value of zero (0).
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 你可以以编程方式移动插入符号在文本框内通过设置`start`到想要移动到设置脱字号的文本框内的位置参数`length`为零 (0) 值的参数。

trans-unit.source: The text box must have focus in order for the caret to be moved.
trans-unit.target: 文本框中必须具有顺序情况下，为要移动插入符号的焦点。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If this method is called without any parameters, an alternative method is used.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果不带任何参数调用此方法，使用一种替代方法。

trans-unit.source: This alternative method inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class.
trans-unit.target: 此备用方法继承<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: When called, it sets the input focus to the control and selects the contents of the control.
trans-unit.target: 调用时，它将输入的焦点设置到控件，并选择控件的内容。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The position of the first character in the current text selection within the text box.
trans-unit.target: 在文本框中当前选定文本的第一个字符的位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters to select.
trans-unit.target: 要选择的字符数。

trans-unit.source: The value of the start parameter is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 值 start 参数小于零。

trans-unit.source: Selects all text in the text box.
trans-unit.target: 在文本框中选择所有文本。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to select all text within the control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法，可选择控件中的所有文本。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Cut%2A> method, which requires text to be selected in the control, to cut the entire contents of the control and paste them into the **Clipboard**.
trans-unit.target: 你可以结合使用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Cut%2A>方法，需要在控件中，控件的整个内容中剪切并粘贴到选择的文本**剪贴板**。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Cut%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the currently selected text in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件中当前选定的文本。

trans-unit.source: You can assign text to this property to change the text currently selected in the text box.
trans-unit.target: 可以将文本分配给此属性，以更改在文本框中当前选定的文本。

trans-unit.source: If no text is currently selected in the text box, this property returns a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: 如果在文本框中当前不选定任何文本，此属性将返回一个零长度字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the currently selected text in the text box.
trans-unit.target: 表示在文本框中当前选定的文本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of characters selected in the text box.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在文本框中选定的字符数。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine if any characters are currently selected in the text box control before performing operations on the selected text.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此属性以确定是否任何字符当前在所选文本执行操作前选择文本框控件中。

trans-unit.source: When the value of the SelectionLength property is set to a value that is larger than the number of characters within the text of the control, the value of the SelectionLength property is set to the entire length of text within the control minus the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionStart%2A> property (if any value is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionStart%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: 当 SelectionLength 属性的值设置为一个值大于控件文本内的字符数时，SelectionLength 属性的值设置为的值减控件中的文本的整个长度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionStart%2A>属性 (如果为指定任何值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionStart%2A>属性)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionStart%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can programmatically move the caret within the text box by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionStart%2A> to the position within the text box where you want the caret to move to and set the SelectionLength property to a value of zero (0).
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 你可以以编程方式移动插入符号在文本框内通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionStart%2A>到要将插入符号移动到并将 SelectionLength 属性设置为零 (0) 值的文本框内的位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text box must have focus in order for the caret to be moved.
trans-unit.target: 文本框中必须具有顺序情况下，为要移动插入符号的焦点。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters selected in the text box.
trans-unit.target: 在文本框中选定的字符数。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 所赋的值小于零。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the starting point of text selected in the text box.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在文本框中选择的文本的起始点。

trans-unit.source: If no text is selected in the control, this property indicates the insertion point, or caret, for new text.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件中不选择任何文本，则此属性指示的插入点或插入符号，新的文本。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to a location beyond the length of the text in the control, the selection start position will be placed after the last character.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为控件中文本的长度超出位置，则将最后一个字符后放置在选择开始位置。

trans-unit.source: When text is selected in the text box control, changing this property might decrease the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在文本框控件中选定文本，更改此属性可能会降低的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the remaining text in the control after the position indicated by the SelectionStart property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A> property, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A> property is automatically decreased.
trans-unit.target: 如果由 SelectionStart 属性指示的位置之后控件中的剩余文本的值少于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A>属性、 的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A>属性会自动减小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the SelectionStart property never causes an increase in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: SelectionStart 属性的值永远不会导致增加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically move the selection within the text box by setting the SelectionStart and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式移动所选内容在文本框内通过设置 SelectionStart 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically move the caret within the text box by setting the SelectionStart to the position within the text box where you want the caret to move to and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A> property to a value of zero (0).
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式移动插入符号在文本框内通过设置为你要将插入符号移动到和设置的文本框内的位置的 SelectionStart<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A>属性的值为零 (0)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> must have focus in order for the selection or the caret to be moved.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>必须具有焦点的选定内容或脱字号移动。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: You can set the SelectionStart property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> that is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> by giving it the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> first.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置的 SelectionStart 属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>即<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>通过给予<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>第一个。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The starting position of text selected in the text box.
trans-unit.target: 在文本框中选择的文本的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 设置的指定的边界<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> control uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.PreferredHeight%2A> property to set the bounds if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AutoSize%2A> property is `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>控件使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.PreferredHeight%2A>属性来设置边界，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AutoSize%2A>属性是`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>属性是`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.PreferredHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the parameters that correspond to the bounds not included in the `specified` parameter are passed in with their current values.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，对应于中未包括的边界的参数`specified`参数将传递使用其当前值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>, or the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> property can be passed in with a reference to the current instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>，或<xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>或<xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>属性可以随对控件的当前实例的引用传递。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: However all values passed in are honored and applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: 但是遵守并应用于控件中传递的所有值。

trans-unit.source: The `specified` parameter represents the elements of the controls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A> changed by your application.
trans-unit.target: `specified`参数表示元素的控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A>更改你的应用程序。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the control, the `specified` parameter value is the `Size` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>的控件，`specified`参数值是`Size` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> is adjusted in response to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property being set, the `specified` parameter value is the `None` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>在响应中调整<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>要设置属性`specified`参数值是`None` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.target: 新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>的控件属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>

trans-unit.target: 新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>的控件属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>

trans-unit.source: Not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用。

trans-unit.target: 按位组合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the defined shortcuts are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用已定义的快捷方式。

trans-unit.source: Use the ShortcutsEnabled property to enable or disable the following shortcut key combinations and the control’s shortcut menu: - CTRL+Z - CTRL+E - CTRL+C - CTRL+Y - CTRL+X - CTRL+BACKSPACE - CTRL+V - CTRL+DELETE - CTRL+A - SHIFT+DELETE - CTRL+L - SHIFT+INSERT - CTRL+R You can override this property to specify other shortcut keys.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ShortcutsEnabled 属性来启用或禁用以下快捷组合键和控件的快捷菜单:-CTRL + Z-CTRL + E-CTRL + C-CTRL + Y-CTRL + X-CTRL + BACKSPACE-CTRL + V-CTRL + DELETE-CTRL + A-SHIFT + DELETE-CTRL + L-SHIFT + INSERT-CTRL + R 可以重写此属性指定其他键盘快捷方式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable the shortcuts; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current text in the text box.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置文本框中的当前文本。

trans-unit.source: To display multiple lines of text in a text box, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要在文本框中显示多行文本，请设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>

trans-unit.source: To read or set the text of a multiline text box, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Lines%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要读取或设置多行文本框的文本，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Lines%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Lines%2A>

trans-unit.source: The amount of text that can be entered in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control is limited only by available system memory.
trans-unit.target: 可输入的文本量<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件仅受可用系统内存。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: The text displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 在控件中显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of text in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件中的文本的长度。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine the number of characters in a string for tasks such as searching for specific strings of text within the text of the control, where knowledge of the total number of characters is needed.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此属性来确定任务，例如搜索的文本在控件文本内的特定字符串的字符串中的字符数需要的总字符数的知识的位置。

trans-unit.target: 控件的文本中包含的字符数。

trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，表示<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Undoes the last edit operation in the text box.
trans-unit.target: 撤消文本框中的最后一个编辑操作。

trans-unit.source: This method will undo the last **Clipboard** or text change operation performed in the text box control if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.CanUndo%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将撤消上次**剪贴板**或文本更改当文本框控件中执行的操作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.CanUndo%2A>属性返回`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.CanUndo%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Undo method does not work with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 撤消方法并不适用于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a multiline text box control automatically wraps words to the beginning of the next line when necessary.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否多行文本框控件自动换行到下一步的行在必要时的开头。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, horizontal scroll bars are not displayed regardless of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`true`，而不考虑不显示水平滚动条<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A>属性设置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In the derived class, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, text within the control will always wrap regardless of the property setting of this property unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign%2A> property is set to `HorizontalAlignment.Left`.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 在派生类中， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>，控件中的文本将始终换行，而不考虑此属性的属性设置除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign%2A>属性设置为`HorizontalAlignment.Left`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the multiline text box control wraps words; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the text box control automatically scrolls horizontally when the user types past the right edge of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在多行文本框控件中换;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果文本框控件自动滚动水平当用户输入超过控件的右边缘。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
